title: Bella Thorne embraces her armpit hair as she gyrates sexily in Instagram video
text:

Bella Thorne has posted a video of her dancing in a bikini as she shows off her armpit hair.

The 22-year-old former Disney Channel star stopped shaving her armpits about a year ago, citing Julia Roberts and Madonna as inspirations for embracing a natural look.

The actress and director is still embracing the look and she wasn't shy to show it all in a sexy Instagram video of her gyrating in a bikini.

Bella was dancing to Russ's Best On Earth, while soaking up the sun in Los Angeles and she made her followers hot under the collar with an eye-popping display.

(Image: Instagram)

Rapper Russ was so impressed with Bella's moves, he reposted the video on his Insta page, while among the avalanche of comments was a message from Bella's ex, Tana Mongeau.

She wrote: "omg, ok".

While it is hard to take your eyes off of Bella's display, fans found it hilarious that a security guard wanders in to shot behind Bella before awkwardly slinking off when he realises that he could be on video.

(Image: Instagram)

Bella was also hailed as 'inspirational' by fans who are loving her unshaved armpits but she has previously dismissed any thoughts that she is trying to inspire anyone.

The star of Disney's Shake It Up had previously revealed: "I just hadn’t really calculated my sleeve length and the waving and how those two things would go together and reveal personal things about me.

“So it wasn't so much a statement, as it's just part of the statement I make as a human on the planet, for myself.”

(Image: Instagram)

In a complete departure from the world of Disney, Bella's directorial debut took her from an intended horror movie to becoming a full-blown adult film.

Him and Her didn't go unnoticed as it won her a prestigious award from Pornhub, despite it starting as a 'Christmas horror movie'.

Speaking about the film, Bella said: "Well, the process of shooting was quite interesting because we had real-life f*****g on set, which I have never shot before.

(Image: Instagram)

"Also this was my first short in general, so it was quite an interesting experience to have the first thing that I really fully directed have so much sex in it.

"It is quite a fun environment."

From the look of her Instagram video, it would seem that Bella is currently living her best life.
